gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer

Class DtdSpecifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer.DtdSpecifier

  • public class DtdSpecifier
extends Object
    Holds information about a DTD, taken from command-line arguments. This is a helper class for App. For each DTD, in addition to the type and the identifier itself, this holds: - title But not the list of roots or the document processor - those are too application-specific.

        public void validate()
